ResourceHeader.Description:
The Hinode X-Ray Telescope (XRT) is a high resolution 
      grazing incidence telescope consisting of X-ray and visible light optics,
      focal plane mechanisms (filters and shutter) and a 2k x 2k CCD camera.
      It operates over a 2 - 200 Angstrom bandwidth.

InformationURL.Name: NAOJ Hinode site
InformationURL.Description:
National Astronomical Observatory of Japan web site 
for Hinode mission, instruments, etc.
